verses.verse: And Jehovah<WH3068> said<WH559> unto Noah<WH5146>, Come<WH935> thou and all thy house<WH1004> into the ark<WH8392>; for thee have I seen<WH7200> righteous<WH6662> before me<WH6440> in this<WH2088> generation<WH1755>.

Of every clean<WH2889> beast<WH929> thou shalt take<WH3947> to thee seven<WH7651> and seven<WH7651>, the male<WH376> and his female<WH802>; and of the beasts<WH929> that are not clean<WH2889> two<WH8147>, the male<WH376> and his female<WH802>:

of the birds<WH5775> also of the heavens<WH8064>, seven<WH7651> and seven<WH7651>, male<WH2145> and female<WH5347>, to keep<WH2421> seed<WH2233> alive<WH2421> upon the face<WH6440> of all the earth<WH776>.

For yet<WH5750> seven<WH7651> days<WH3117>, and I will cause it to rain<WH4305> upon the earth<WH776> forty<WH705> days<WH3117> and forty<WH705> nights<WH3915>; and every<WH3605> living thing<WH3351> that I have made<WH6213> will I destroy<WH4229> from off<WH5921> the face<WH6440> of the ground<WH127>.
And Noah<WH5146> did<WH6213> according unto all that Jehovah<WH3068> commanded him<WH6680>.
And Noah<WH5146> was six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> when the flood<WH3999> of waters<WH4325> was upon the earth<WH776>.

And Noah<WH5146> went in<WH935>, and his sons<WH1121>, and his wife<WH802>, and his sons<WH1121>' wives<WH802> with him<WH8392>, into the ark, because of<WH6440> the waters<WH4325> of the flood<WH3999>.
Of clean<WH2889> beasts<WH929>, and of beasts<WH929> that are not clean<WH2889>, and of birds<WH5775>, and of everything that creepeth<WH7430> upon the ground<WH127>,
there went in<WH935> two<WH8147> and two<WH8147> unto Noah<WH5146> into the ark<WH8392>, male<WH2145> and female<WH5347>, as<WH834> God<WH430> commanded<WH6680> Noah<WH5146>.
And it came to pass after the seven<WH7651> days<WH3117>, that the waters<WH4325> of the flood<WH3999> were upon the earth<WH776>.

In <WH8141> the six<WH8337> hundredth<WH3967> year<WH8141> of Noah<WH5146>'s life<WH2416>, in the second<WH8145> month<WH2320>, on the seventeenth<WH7651> day<WH3117> of the month<WH2320>, on the same<WH2088> day<WH3117> were all the fountains<WH4599> of the great<WH7227> deep<WH8415> broken up<WH1234>, and the windows<WH699> of heaven<WH8064> were opened<WH6605>.
And the rain<WH1653> was upon the earth<WH776> forty<WH705> days<WH3117> and forty<WH705> nights<WH3915>.

In the selfsame<WH6106> day<WH3117> entered<WH935> Noah<WH5146>, and Shem<WH8035>, and Ham<WH2526>, and Japheth<WH3315>, the sons<WH1121> of Noah<WH5146>, and Noah<WH5146>'s wife<WH802>, and the three<WH7969> wives<WH802> of his sons<WH1121> with them<WH8392>, into the ark;

they <WH1992>, and every beast<WH2416> after its kind<WH4327>, and all the cattle<WH929> after their kind<WH4327>, and every creeping thing<WH7431> that creepeth<WH7430> upon the earth<WH776> after its kind<WH4327>, and every bird after its kind<WH4327>, every bird<WH6833> of every sort<WH3671>.
And they went in<WH935> unto Noah<WH5146> into the ark<WH8392>, two<WH8147> and two<WH8147> of all flesh<WH1320> wherein<WH834> is the breath<WH7307> of life<WH2416>.
And they that went in<WH935>, went in<WH935> male<WH2145> and female<WH5347> of all flesh<WH1320>, as God<WH430> commanded<WH6680> him<WH3068>: and Jehovah shut him in<WH5462>.

And the flood<WH3999> was forty<WH705> days<WH3117> upon the earth<WH776>; and the waters<WH4325> increased<WH7235>, and bare up<WH5375> the ark<WH8392>, and it was lifted up<WH7311> above the earth<WH776>.
And the waters<WH4325> prevailed<WH1396>, and increased<WH7235> greatly<WH3966> upon the earth<WH776>; and the ark<WH8392> went<WH3212> upon the face<WH6440> of the waters<WH4325>.
And the waters<WH4325> prevailed<WH1396> exceedingly<WH3966> upon the earth<WH776>; and all the high<WH1364> mountains that were under<WH8478> the whole heaven<WH8064> were covered<WH3680>.
Fifteen <WH6240> cubits<WH520> upward<WH4605> did the waters<WH4325> prevail<WH1396>; and the mountains<WH2022> were covered<WH3680>.

And all flesh<WH1320> died<WH1478> that moved<WH7430> upon the earth<WH776>, both birds<WH5775>, and cattle<WH929>, and beasts<WH2416>, and every creeping thing<WH8318> that creepeth<WH8317> upon the earth<WH776>, and every man<WH120>:
all in whose nostrils<WH639> was the breath<WH5397> of the spirit of life<WH2416>, of all that was on the dry<WH2724> land<WH4191>, died.

And every living thing<WH3351> was destroyed<WH4229> that was upon the face<WH6440> of the ground<WH127>, both man<WH120>, and cattle<WH929>, and creeping things<WH7431>, and birds<WH5775> of the heavens<WH8064>; and they were destroyed<WH4229> from the earth<WH776>: and Noah<WH5146> only<WH389> was left<WH7604>, and they that<WH834> were with him in the ark<WH8392>.
And the waters<WH4325> prevailed<WH1396> upon the earth<WH776> a hundred<WH3967> and fifty<WH2572> days<WH3117>.
